title: Priyanka Chopra hits the town in skintight bubblegum sweater and pink skirt and heels in NYC
text:
Another day, another figure-hugging outfit for Priyanka Chopra as she continued her publicity tour Tuesday for movie The Sky Is Pink.

The actress, 37, stepped out in New York in a skintight bubblegum pink sweater tucked into a paler pink knee-length skirt.

Her hair was loose falling down over her eyes and she added glossy lip color that complemented the color of her ensemble.

Unmissable: Another day, another striking figure-hugging outfit for Priyanka Chopra as she continued her publicity tour in New York Tuesday for her Hindi-language movie The Sky Is Pink

The former Quantico star went bare-legged in pink heels and carried a rectangular wicker purse with a pink ribbon round it.

Priyanka is in New York after a whirlwind publicity tour in her native India to promote her new movie.

The Sky Is Pink marks her return to Bollywood after a three-year hiatus.

Although it is in Hindi, the movie has got a North America release on October 11.

She stars with Indian actor Farhan Akhtar in the story of a couple's relationship as narrated by their dead daughter.

In December, Priyanka will celebrate her first wedding anniversary with musician Nick Jonas, 27.

The couple tied the knot in a lavish extravaganza including Christian and Hindu ceremonies that took place over several days in the Indian city of Jodhpur.

In an interview on NBC's Today on Tuesday morning, the actress said she 'really can't wait' to have children with the Jonas Brother.

'I mean, there's so much that happens in our lives that whenever God blesses us with that it's something that we both definitely want,' she explained.

Back in March, she had mentioned to People that while both she and Nick are keen to start a family, it might not happen soon because they both have very hectic individual schedules.
